EmailTemplate.description: Email Response (account already exists) and customer has a superuser on account:
EmailTemplate.name: Email Response (acct exists) and customer has a superuser on acct:
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Contacting Office Depot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
The below email was received via the Sign My Company Up feature on the BSD website. Please contact {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} via phone at {!Lead.MobilePhone} or by email at {!Lead.Email} as promptly as possible. They are interested in establishing a contract account in your area. Thank you.
